Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tracker.model.project

Class Project

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tracker.model.project.Project
public class Project extends Object
The Project class handles a project in the WolfTracker system.
Author:
Anoushka Piduru

    • isChanged

      public boolean isChanged()
      Determines whether the project has changed since the last save.
      Returns:
      true if the project has changed, false if not.

    • setChanged

      public void setChanged(boolean isChanged)
      Setter for the isChanged() method.
      Parameters:
      isChanged - the boolean value for whether the project has changed or not.

      Parameters:
      logName - the name of the log.

    • getCurrentLog

      public AbstractTaskLog getCurrentLog()
      Getter for the current log.
      Returns:
      an abstract task log representing the current log.

    • editCategoryLogName

      public void editCategoryLogName(String categoryName)
      Changes the name of the category log.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the new category name.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is invalid or currentLog is AllTasksLog.

    • removeCategoryLog

      public void removeCategoryLog()
      Removes a category log.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if current log is the all tasks log.

    • addTask

      public void addTask(Task t)
      Adds a new task.
      Parameters:
      t - the task to be added.

    • editTask

      public void editTask(int idx, String taskName, int taskDuration, String taskDetails)
      Edits an existing task.
      Parameters:
      idx - the index of the task.
      taskName - the name of the task.
      taskDuration - the time spent on the task.
      taskDetails - the description of the task.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are invalid.

    • removeTask

      public void removeTask(int idx)
      Removes the task at a given index.
      Parameters:
      idx - the index of the task.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is invalid.

    • getMostRecentTasks

      public String[][] getMostRecentTasks()
      Determines the most recent tasks of each category.
      Returns:
      a 2D string array of the most recent tasks of each category.
